## Jane Davidson's Helpful Website
Dr. Davidson is the author of the primary textbook in the course. She is an accomplished evaluator who has generally created a large impact within the field and has a [website](https://www.betterevaluation.org) dedicated to the practice of evaluation full of resources. While not mandated, you may want to look around and bookmark the site.
